title: Affordable Housing in Raleigh, Durham, and Chapel Hill | CASA
text: Affordable Housing in Raleigh, Durham, and Chapel Hill Our Mission at CASA is to provide access to stable, affordable housing for people who are homeless or at risk by developing and managing rental communities. A safe, affordable home is more than just a roof, it’s a foundation for stability and hope. Hear from one of our King’s Ridge residents about how CASA’s mission has transformed their life, and join us in continuing this vital work. The Solution to Homelessness is Housing CASA is a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization that provides affordable housing in Durham, Chapel Hill, Raleigh, and other surrounding communities. We accomplish this by offering family housing, veterans’ housing, workforce housing solutions, and disability housing programs and solutions. With your help, CASA can continue solving homelessness in the Triangle and create more opportunities for successful living by providing those in need a vital resource: a home. Diversity makes us stronger as an organization. As part of our commitment to equality for all, we welcome people from all races, religions, ethnicities, countries of origin, sexual orientations, gender identities, and abilities.
